function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation in public buildings and shared spaces","Impact":"Increased risk of spreading infectious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates through system modifications","Technologies":"Ventilation system upgrades, air purifiers","People":"Occupants of public buildings and shared spaces","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, government authorities"},{"Description":"Survival of airborne pathogens in indoor environments","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne transmission of infectious diseases","Mitigation":"Enhance ventilation and air filtration, use of air purifiers","Technologies":"Air quality monitoring systems, HVAC upgrades, air filtration systems","People":"Occupants of indoor environments","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Returning to inadequately ventilated workplaces and public buildings","Impact":"Increased risk of viral infection through inhalation","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates through system modifications, air purifiers","Technologies":"Ventilation system upgrades, air purifiers","People":"Workers, students, visitors of public buildings","Owner":"Employers, building owners, facility managers"}]}
